comments.body:
Return command will discard configure directly and return to user-view, which is the base context.
But some new version os will give a prompt to wait a confirm command with a return until it trigger a time out error.
So fix it.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +99,103 @@                if prompt.startswith('[*'):
                    conn.exec_command('clear configuration candidate')
                conn.exec_command('return')
                out = conn.get_prompt()
                prompt = to_text(out, errors='surrogate_then_replace').strip()
